name: Jolthog Cryst

ability.name: Cold Bomb
ability.description: When activated, equips Jolthog Cryst to the player's hand. When thrown at an enemy, causes an icy explosion upon impact.

description: It releases cold air stored in its body when under attack. The frigid blast it radiates is cold enough to freeze the surrounding air and easily pierces through any attacker's body.

skills.name: Ice Missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: Power Shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: Iceberg
skills.description: Summons a sharp ice lance under an enemy.

skills.name: Power Bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: Icicle Cutter
skills.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

skills.name: Cryst Breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Blizzard Spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.
